🚨 The boss has discussed his selection plans for Wednesday night, with two first-team players ruled out... ⤵️

#MUFC #UELfinal

💬 "We only had 10,000 fans last week, but that made a huge difference. You felt goosebumps when you first walked out," @LukeShaw23 adds.

"It will be nice to have them back for a big game like this, and hopefully we can give them a night to remember." 👊

#MUFC #UELfinal

Over to you, @LukeShaw23 🤝

🗣 "There's much more confidence and belief in the squad. We're improving all the time and tomorrow is another step in the right direction."

#MUFC #UELfinal

🗣 "We come to this club because we want to win trophies," @B_Fernandes8 adds. 

"I think every player knows you come here to fight for trophies and to be a better player. The pressure to win is there, but pressure is good for me." 💭

#MUFC #UELfinal

The boss hands over to @B_Fernandes8 🎤

🗣 "Being in the final is good, but to be perfect we have to win tomorrow," Bruno says.

"The team is confident and we trust ourselves. We know what we have to do." 🧠

#MUFC #UELfinal

💭 "The players sign for United to win trophies, accepting the challenge to become the best, because this is the best club in the world," Ole adds.

"That's something they are ready for, because they wouldn't have signed here if they weren't top players." 

#MUFC #UELfinal

🗣 "It might be the stepping stone for something better to come, a bright future," the boss adds.

"This is a young team. It's a team that we've rebuilt over the last couple of years, so this is hopefully the start of something more."

#MUFC #UELfinal

💭 "Every player who goes into a final has the expectation and pressure to win," Ole says.

"I feel confident that we are ready for this. In a final, anything can happen, so we have to be ready." 

#MUFC #UELfinal

💬 "If you get that feeling for winning, you're going to be more experienced," says @McTominay10.

"You have to train properly every day, work hard and push yourself. We can't just win a final and say we're here. We want to go strong for everything."

#MUFC #UEL

Over to @McTominay10 in today's press conference 🎙️

"We pay the competition big respect and winning it really is a foundation for next season. It's an opportunity to put a statement down."

#MUFC #UEL

💬 "The next trophy always means the most, but of course you feel more responsible [winning as a manager]," says Ole.

"For me, this is my focus at the moment and I only want to do what's best for this club."

#MUFC #UEL

💬 "Manchester United has meant a lot to me throughout my life, so to lead the team out in a final is going to be a proud moment.

"We're all focused and I can't wait to see the players walk out onto that pitch."
